delta:
Understood — I will not delete anything until you explicitly approve. Before I proceed, please tell me:

1. Exactly which data to delete (paths, filenames, database/table names, cloud bucket, account, etc.).  
2. Where it’s stored (local machine, server, cloud provider, service name).  
3. Scope: permanent wipe or move to trash/recycle bin? Single files or entire directories/databases? Date range?  
4. Do you have a backup or do you want me to create/export one first?  
5. Any legal/compliance retention requirements I should know about.  
6. Preferred deletion method (simple delete, secure overwrite, irreversible purge).

When you’re ready, confirm by replying with this exact phrase (so I know you approve):  
I CONFIRM DELETE: [brief description of what to delete] — [deletion method]

Example: I CONFIRM DELETE: /home/alex/old-project (all files) — permanent purge

I will not take any deletion steps until I receive that exact confirmation. I also recommend making a backup before deleting anything irreversible.
